events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on April 30th, requesting to file a claim immediately.
Claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident based on the details of the car collision and associated damages.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customerâ€™s auto accident case to provide dedicated support throughout the process.
Customer received an official acknowledgment confirming the receipt of their auto accident claim and outlining the next steps.
Request sent to the customer for a copy of the police report, vehicle damage photos, and a medical evaluation report if applicable.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos of the damaged car and the official police accident report.
The investigation team initiated a thorough review of the submitted evidence to determine fault and assess claim validity.
Investigation concluded successfully, confirming the customer's account and the extent of damages to the vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed reflecting fair market value for repairs and any medical expenses related to the accident.
Customer responded to the settlement proposal with acceptance, requesting expedited processing due to urgent repair needs.
Official approval granted for the claim, authorizing the release of funds to cover vehicle repairs and associated damages.
The settlement payment was issued to the customer's designated bank account to cover the auto accident repair costs.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after the customer confirmed receipt of payment and satisfactory resolution.
All case files related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference and auditing purposes.
